summary:
high quality high resolution replacer for bonemold armor set
 dragonborn dlc required
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b][color=orange]Distribution permission[/color][/b]: This file is a [b]Nexus-exclusive release[/b], please respect my decision and DO NOT reupload it elsewhere... I did not give, nor want to give permission for any kind of reupload.[/size]

[size=5] HD Retexture for bonemold armor set [/size]

  °°°  main file default resolution is 2048X2048.
         4096X4096  and 1024X1024 available as optional download
 
  °°° As usual, everything has been redone from scratch

  °°° files are already optimized using ddsopt

  °°° Dragonborn DLC is required (what an incredible news)

[youtube]o5bPK4g82QA[/youtube] [youtube]J2H71keGTCw[/youtube] [youtube]_B3QTs3Gp-4[/youtube] [youtube]AR-X2eCxgrI[/youtube]
  

  °°°  [b]INSTALLATION[/b]: chose which version you want to install ,2k, 1k or 4k,use modmanager.
 OR 
download manually open the chosen package with 7zip or winrar , drop \"textures\" inside data folder .


beta testers image contributors and friends of AMB project:
